name: Falafel Burgers
author: Cans Get You Cooking®
summary: Featuring nutrient-rich canned spinach and chickpeas, these burgers will quickly become a favorite in your home.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and rinsed
directions: In 12-inch skillet over medium heat, in 1 tablespoon hot olive oil, cook red onion and garlic about 5 minutes until tender-crisp
To food processor, add one-fourth of garbanzo beans, lemon juice and salt; pulse canned spinach until mixture is a smooth paste
Add remaining garbanzo beans, breadcrumbs and onion mixture; pulse until coarsely chopped
(If desired, you can refrigerate until ready to cook
) In 12-inch skillet over medium heat, in remaining tablespoon hot olive oil, cook falafel patties until golden and crisp, turning once
Serve with any of the above serving suggestions
